short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Replaces your default search engine with Direct Search Online.
short.de: Ersetzt Ihre Standardsuchmaschine durch Direct Search Online.
short.es: Sustituye tu motor de búsqueda predeterminado por Direct Search Online.
short.fr: Remplace votre moteur de recherche par défaut par Direct Search Online.
short.it: Sostituisce il tuo motore di ricerca predefinito con Direct Search Online.
short.pt_BR: Substitui seu mecanismo de busca padrão por Direct Search Online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the web directly from the browser address bar. 
Search engine is Direct Search Online with results powered by Yahoo!

Permission asked on directsearchonline.com to search for the best web results for you.
